title.text: CCS held a summer school of philosophy online

descr.text: For the first time, the Moscow Center for Consciousness Studies at Moscow State University held an international summer philosophical school in an online format.
The first exhibition of the private collection of businessman and philosopher Dmitry Volkov became available for viewing online.

title.text: Why is there no museum of philosophy?

descr.text: Collector and philosopher Dmitry Volkov, together with the artist and theorist of contemporary art Pavel Pepperstein, discussed why the Museum of Philosophy does not exist, the prospects of its creation, as well as exhibits that they would place in it.
